Title: An Act Establishing a National High School in the Municipality of Maimbung, Province of Sulu, to be Known as the Maimbung National School, and Appropriating Funds Therefor
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 479
An Act Establishing a National High School in the Municipality of Maimbung, Province of Sulu, to be Known as the Maimbung National School, and Appropriating Funds Therefor
Section 1. A national high school is hereby established, in the Municipality of Maimbung, Province of Sulu, to be known as the Maimbung National High School.1Ã¢wphi1
Section 2. Such sum as may necessary for the operation and maintenance of said school shall be provided in subsequent General Appropriations Acts, until which time the operation of the institution as a national high school shall be deferred.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: June 10, 1983
